name: Pearl Hunter
description:
Pearl Hunter is a short action game where you dive trying to collect pearls.

Controls

Use W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move.
Q : Exit to main menu

IMPORTANT: Browsers prevent keyboard input unless the player click on the game window first. So click first in the game window before try to play the game.

Also web export of Godot engine can sometime fail to load the first time. Just refresh browser window and try again. Sorry about that but it's an engine quirk.
